Articles.Content:
Hey All,

I have been playing around a bit with Kraken drives and am starting to try and think of ways to create an inertial dampener to reduce the g load on the Karbala passengers.  Has anyone else had a play around with this and what ideas have you tried that have met with some success in reducing the g-load on the Karbala. 

 

Cheers,

Skarlinger.
